greatMigration.earnUpTo: and earn up to <highlight>{apr}% APR</highlight> in OP Bonus Rewards

Home.withdrawAnyTime: You can withdraw your full deposit at any time

Prizes.winUpTo: Keep your deposit. Win up to <amount></amount>
Prizes.learnMore: Prizes and frequencies are estimations. <link>Learn how PoolTogether works</link>

drawWinners.beforeValue: {numPeople, plural, one {# person} other {# people}} won

drawTotal.beforeValue: This draw had {numWallets} unique wallets winning a total of

drawModal.youWereEligible: You were eligible for this draw.

Vaults.depositAndWin: Deposit tokens, <highlight>win prizes</highlight>. Withdraw anytime, <highlight>no loss</highlight>
Vaults.disclaimer: PoolTogether prize vaults can be deployed by anyone. <link>Know what you are depositing into</link>

Vault.smartContractRisk: PoolTogether is a permissionless protocol that anyone can use to deploy prize vaults. <docsLink>Read our documentation</docsLink> to learn more. This prize vault exposes you to smart contract risk related to the <vaultLink>vault contract</vaultLink> and its underlying <yieldLink>yield contract</yieldLink>.
Vault.inVaultLists: This prize vault is in the following vault lists you have selected:
Vault.notInVaultLists: This prize vault is not in any of the vault lists you have selected.
Vault.shortWarningNotInVaultLists: Warning! This vault is not in any of your active lists.

poolStaking.reserveDescription: The {token} in the <highlight>POOL reserve</highlight> goes to this vault and is distributed as prizes!

Account.connectWallet: Connect your wallet to view account status
Account.noVaultLists: You don't have any vault lists selected.
Account.noPrizeTokens: You don't have any prize tokens.
Account.noPrizesRecently: You haven't won any prizes recently.

prizeChecking.eligibleDraws: You were eligible for {number, plural, one {# draw} other {# draws}}

TxModals.delegateSelfDescription: You are delegating to yourself. Any prize your {tokens} deposit wins will go to your wallet.
TxModals.delegateDescription: The delegated address receives any prizes your {tokens} deposit wins.
TxModals.nowEligible: You are now eligible for all future draws in this pool.
TxModals.risksDisclaimer: PoolTogether is a permissionless protocol. Prize vaults can be deployed by anyone. Make sure you know what you are depositing into. <vaultLink>Learn more about this prize vault.</vaultLink>
TxModals.depositDisclaimer: By clicking "Confirm Deposit", you agree to Cabana's <tosLink>Terms of Service</tosLink>. Click <vaultLink>here</vaultLink> to learn more about the vault you're depositing into.

Settings.vaultListsDescription: Vault lists determine what prize vaults are displayed throughout the app. Use caution when interacting with imported lists.
Settings.urlInput: https:// or ipfs:// or ENS name
Settings.numTestnetVaults: {number, plural, one {# testnet vault} other {# testnet vaults}}
Settings.customRpcDescription: Route the app's onchain queries through RPCs of your choosing. These are stored locally on your browser.
Settings.refreshToUpdateRPCs: Refresh the page to see changes

Frequency.xPrizesDaily: {number, plural, one {# prize} other {# prizes}} daily
Frequency.xPrizesWeekly: {number, plural, one {# prize} other {# prizes}} weekly
Frequency.xPrizesMonthly: {number, plural, one {# prize} other {# prizes}} monthly
Frequency.xPrizesYearly: {number, plural, one {# prize} other {# prizes}} yearly

Frequency.inXdays: In {number, plural, one {# day} other {# days}}
Frequency.inXweeks: In {number, plural, one {# week} other {# weeks}}
Frequency.inXmonths: In {number, plural, one {# month} other {# months}}

Tooltips.prizes: Prizes you can win while deposited in a vault
Tooltips.relativeWinChance: A vault's relative win chance compared to other vaults
Tooltips.prizeYield: A recent average of a vault's contributions to the prize pool
Tooltips.bonusRewards: An estimate of current extra incentives for depositors
Tooltips.winChance: Your chance to win a prize in any given draw
Tooltips.approval: You'll give your approval to deposit a specific amount of {symbol}
Tooltips.vaultFee: A percentage of yield that does not go towards prizes, and is determined by the vault owner
Tooltips.importedVault: This vault is from the following imported list(s):
Tooltips.vaultContribution: The amount of {symbol} contributed to the prize pool, enabling wins in this vault
Tooltips.vaultContributionWithDays: The amount of {symbol} contributed to the prize pool over the last {days} days, enabling wins in this vault
Tooltips.deprecatedVault: This vault has been deprecated. It may still be eligible to win prizes, but we encourage users to migrate to other vaults.
Tooltips.wrongPrizePoolVault: This vault is connected to a prize pool not supported by this interface.
Tooltips.badPrecisionPerDollar: This vault is likely to have rounding errors which may lead to lossy withdrawals.
Tooltips.delegateDescription: By default the prize token holder is the delegated address. That can be overridden with delegation.

vaultListImports.selectedVaultList: "{name}" has been added to your currently selected vault lists.
vaultListImports.failedImport: Something went wrong while importing a vault list from {src}.

Error.noVaultListsEnabled: It looks like you don't have any valid vault lists enabled.
Error.noVaultsMatchingFilters: There are no vaults that match your filters.
Error.vaultEnableTestnets: If you're looking to view a testnet vault, make sure to "Enable Testnets" in the settings below.
Error.vaultDisableTestnets: If you're looking to view a mainnet vault, make sure to "Disable Testnets" in the settings below.
Error.vaultInvalidInterface: This doesn't look like a valid vault address.
Error.vaultQueryError: Something went wrong while querying this vault's info.
Error.pageNotFound: We couldn't find the page you're looking for.

aaveCollateralizationError.issue: This vault is experiencing issues due to using a high percentage of Aave's supply. <link>Learn more</link>
aaveCollateralizationError.recommendation: It is not recommended to withdraw at this time
aaveCollateralizationError.moreInfo: You may be able to swap out via <uniLink>Uniswap</uniLink>, or wait for the vault to normalize. For further updates, visit PoolTogether's <discordLink>Discord</discordLink>

formErrors.invalidSrc: Not a valid URL or ENS domain
formErrors.sameAsDelegate: Entered address is same as current delegate
formErrors.invalidRpcNetwork: This RPC doesn't seem to be for the {network} network
